contentrichtext.text: The '''Horseshoe Bend''' place-name may refer to any of several locations: {{TOC right}} ==Places== ===USA=== * [[Battle of Horseshoe Bend (1814)]] in Alabama, a battle of the Creek War ** location of [[Horseshoe Bend National Military Park]] * [[Horseshoe Bend (Arizona)]], a meander of the Colorado River in Arizona * [[Horseshoe Bend, Arkansas]] * [[Horseshoe Bend, California]], a [[Placer mining|placer]] and [[hydraulic mining|hydraulic]] [[gold mining]] camp along the [[Merced River]], now covered by the waters of [[Lake McClure]]. * [[Horseshoe Bend, Idaho]] * The Horseshoe bend of the [[Ohio River]] * [[Battle of Horseshoe Bend (1832)]] a battle of the Black Hawk War which took place in Wisconsin ===England=== * [[Horseshoe Bend, Shirehampton]] ==See also== * [[Horseshoe curve (disambiguation)]] [[Category:Place name disambiguation pages]] {{geodis}}
